changes.value: Restructure pricing into 3 tier cards on desktop (equal width) and a single-column stack o...

changes.rationale: Improves conversion without cluttering the hero; mobile users get persistent access to the...

changes.value: Use 18px body text with 1.5 line-height and a max line length of 65ch
changes.rationale: Enhances clarity and calmness in reading

changes.value: Implement a button hierarchy: primary buttons at 16px with 24px padding
changes.rationale: Creates a clear visual distinction between primary and secondary actions

changes.value: Implement a neutral color palette with soft grays and whites for backgrounds
changes.rationale: Establishes a serene environment that promotes focus on content

changes.value: Use a soft shadow effect (4px blur) for cards and buttons
changes.rationale: Adds a premium quality to the components

changes.value: Use proof chips with a subtle shadow and 8px padding
Design cards with a 16px radius and 16px padding
Add subtle dividers (1px solid light gray) between sections
Create an audit log section with a vertical timeline format

issues.description: Hero 60/40 grid may fail 8-second comprehension test on mobile - unclear what LaunchBase actually does
issues.rationale: Tagline 'Launch business in 48 hours' is vague without concrete value props visible immediately

issues.description: Primary CTA lacks urgency/scarcity - no reason to act now vs later for business launch platform
issues.rationale: Generic CTA group without time-sensitive messaging reduces conversion pressure

issues.description: Proof bar under hero creates scroll delay before trust signals - may lose skeptical visitors
issues.rationale: Trust elements should be visible immediately, not requiring any scroll for credibility

issues.description: Sticky CTA at 40% scroll too late - conversion intent peaks in first 15 seconds
issues.rationale: Mobile users make decisions quickly; CTA availability gap between hero and 40% scroll

issues.description: Audit log pattern unclear value - may confuse rather than build trust for non-technical users
issues.rationale: Timeline format may not communicate business launch benefits clearly to target audience

issues.description: 3-tier pricing creates decision paralysis - no clear recommended option for first-time visitors
issues.rationale: Equal-width cards without visual hierarchy make tier selection cognitively demanding

issues.description: 18px body text with 65ch line length may be too dense on mobile screens under 375px width
issues.rationale: Line length optimization typically requires responsive adjustment for narrow viewports

issues.description: Button 24px padding may create oversized tap targets that feel clunky on mobile interfaces
issues.rationale: Large padding can make buttons feel disproportionate to surrounding content density

issues.description: Soft gray backgrounds may reduce contrast ratios below WCAG AA standards for accessibility
issues.rationale: Neutral palettes risk insufficient contrast between text and background elements

issues.description: 4px shadow blur on all cards may create visual noise when multiple cards are stacked vertically
issues.rationale: Uniform shadows can compound into distracting visual weight in card-heavy layouts

suggestedFixes.fix: Add specific benefit bullets: '48-hour LLC setup', 'Banking in 24hrs', 'Tax ID same day' above fold
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete deliverables improve comprehension and reduce abstract positioning confusion

suggestedFixes.fix: Change primary CTA to 'Start My Business Today' with urgency indicator like '48hr guarantee'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Time-bound language creates immediate action motivation aligned with product promise

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof elements into hero right column (40% space) as stacked trust indicators
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates scroll requirement for credibility signals and maximizes above-fold trust

suggestedFixes.fix: Trigger sticky CTA at 20% scroll instead of 40%, use slide-up animation from bottom
suggestedFixes.rationale: Earlier availability captures conversion intent before attention drops significantly

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace audit log with 'Business Setup Progress' tracker showing 3-step completion flow
suggestedFixes.rationale: Progress visualization is more intuitive for business launch context than technical logs

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'Most Popular' badge to middle tier and increase its visual prominence by 120% scale
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear recommendation reduces decision fatigue and guides users toward optimal choice

suggestedFixes.fix: Use responsive line length: 65ch desktop, 45ch tablet, 35ch mobile with 16px minimum body
suggestedFixes.rationale: Viewport-optimized reading experience maintains readability across device sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 20px vertical, 32px horizontal padding for primary CTAs with 44px minimum touch target
suggestedFixes.rationale: Balanced proportions meet accessibility guidelines while maintaining premium feel

suggestedFixes.fix: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum, use #f8f9fa backgrounds with #212529 text
suggestedFixes.rationale: WCAG AA compliance maintains accessibility while preserving clean aesthetic goals

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 2px blur for cards, 4px only for elevated elements like modals or sticky components
suggestedFixes.rationale: Selective shadow application creates hierarchy without overwhelming visual weight
